name: Katipunan
startIntroPart1: Mabuhay Supremo Bonifacio, Father of the Philippine Revolution. For centuries the Spaniards colonized the Filipino people but it was you who realized a united Filipino front to obtain our collective freedoms. The colonizers feared your revolt, for the hope of the Filipino people was strong and your example set the precedent for the future efforts to attain Philippine freedom.
startIntroPart2: The Philippine hope still resides in you and your Katipuneros. Will you be able to achieve a free Nation in this unfamiliar world?
declaringWar: You are a threat to our people, prepare to die!
attacked: It was only a matter of time, greed truly is universal
introduction: Pagbati sayo estranghero. Respect our free nation and we'll respect you.
afterPeace: Sa wakas, natapos na uli ang paglalaban.
tradeRequest: We have an offer for you. presyong suki na yan!
uniques: Comment [Free Katipunan Unit appears upon founding a city until the Renaissance Era]
Free [Katipon] appears <upon founding a city> <during the [Ancient era]> <hidden from users>
Free [Kawal] appears <upon founding a city> <during the [Classical era]> <hidden from users>
Free [Bayani] appears <upon founding a city> <during the [Medieval era]> <hidden from users>
Free [Katipunero] appears <upon founding a city> <during the [Renaissance era]> <hidden from users>

name: Illustrados
leaderName: Doctor José Protacio Rizal Mercado y Alonso Realonda
startIntroPart1: Mabuhay Doctor Jose Rizal, the national hero of the Filipino people. Your unparalled with and skill with the pen led to the enlightenment of your motherland which sparked the revolt of the mind of the Filipino masses. Your unfortunate demise inspred the revolt of others and your deeds are honored in annals of Philippine history.
startIntroPart2: Will you be able to achieve an age of Filipino enlightenment, or will your people once again resort to violent ways of war.
introduction: Greetings traveller, care to share travel stories over a mug of ale?
neutralHello: Hello, Hola, Pagbati, こんにちは, Bonjour, Hallo, Salve, Olá, Ciao, Γειά σου
afterPeace: We have proven ourselves worthy of our liberty
tradeRequest: Our people pride themselves in being worty of a good trade.
uniqueName: The Pen is Mightier Than The Sword
uniques: Comment [Can construct [Illustrado] units which can speed up the research of one tech]
[All] units gain the [Pag-asa ng Bayan] promotion
